ruleset.name: Matrics
ruleset.description: The Matrics ruleset contains a collection of good practices which should be followed.

rule.name: EfferentCoupling
rule.message: Avoid instantiating Boolean objects; reference Boolean.TRUE or Boolean.FALSE or call Boolean.valueOf() instead.
rule.description: Avoid instantiating Boolean objects; you can reference Boolean.TRUE, Boolean.FALSE, or call Boolean.valueOf() instead.
rule.example: Boolean bar = new Boolean("true"); // unnecessary creation, just reference Boolean.TRUE; Boolean buz = Boolean.valueOf(false); // ...., just reference Boolean.FALSE;
